bibl.title: Harry Smith and Barney Slomen v. United States. Order.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.placeName: Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT, IN AND FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, NORTHERN DIVISION.
UNITED STATE OF AMERICA, Plaintiff, vs. Barney Slomen, Defendant. No. ORDER

Upon the reading of the verified Petition of the above named petitioner, and upon the reading of the Affidavit hereunto annexed, and good cause appearing therefor, it is hereby ORDERED, ADJUDGED, and DECREED:
1. That the petitioner may appear and prosecute this action in Forma Pauperis.
2. That the necessary fees and costs of court be paid by the Government.
FILED IN THE U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, Northern Division JUL 1-1916 Frank L. Crosby, Cerk Crosby
IN THE U.S. DISTRICT COURT IN THE SUPERIOR COURT STATE OF WASHINGTON WESTERN DISTRICT, NORTHERN DIV.
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, Plaintiff vs BARNEY SLOMEN, Defendant
BEELER and SULLIVAN Lawyers 510-11White Building, Seattle, Washington,
